homePageText.title: Logic Apps Diagnostics
homePageText.description: Use Logic Apps Diagnostics to investigate how your app is performing, diagnose issues, and discover how to improve its reliability. Select the problem category that best matches the information or tool that you're interested in:

categories.name: Diagnostics
categories.description: Is your logic app experiencing problems or slowness? To get an overview about the most recent runs and their steps, troubleshoot, and identify possible improvements, select this category.

categories.name: Connector Actions Health
categories.description: Are you seeing any action failures in your logic app? Review connector actions health to get the details on connector errors, timeouts, or any other unexpected behavior.
